name: Khushi Patangia
position: Building AI Products to Transform the Sports Industry

current_company.name: Stupa Sports Analytics
current_company.title: Building AI Products to Transform the Sports Industry

experience.title: Product Manager - AI
experience.description: ● Developed an AI-powered smart court web app for racket sports, integrating IoT video ingestion and computer vision models to generate statistics, boosting player engagement by 31%, and providing coaches with actionable insights for skill improvement● Increased computer vision model accuracy to 88% from 45% for player performance analysis; rolled out features to display stats using AR and commentator prompts, thus increasing live streaming platform sales by 28%● Aligning with cross-functional team stakeholders (tech, design, ML, graphics, IoT, & DevOps)on product roadmaps and KPIs and ensuring timely delivery of high-impact sports analytics products
experience.description_html: ● Developed an AI-powered smart court web app for racket sports, integrating IoT video ingestion and computer vision models to generate statistics, boosting player engagement by 31%, and providing coaches with actionable insights for skill improvement● Increased computer vision model accuracy to 88% from 45% for player performance analysis; rolled out features to display stats using AR and commentator prompts, thus increasing live streaming platform sales by 28%● Aligning with cross-functional team stakeholders (tech, design, ML, graphics, IoT, & DevOps)on product roadmaps and KPIs and ensuring timely delivery of high-impact sports analytics products

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: ● Developed a personalized dashboard using the Fogg model, built a hypothesis from data trends, and validated it through user interviews; understanding their pain points and motivating them via prioritized prompts & a summary of their activities, thus boosting engagement by 26 percentage points● Applied the Hook model to increase new user activation by 23% by nudging them via curated journeys created by looking at historical data patterns of retention rates● Introduced a gamified league leaderboard system by making similar skilled users compete, ranking & promoting them to drive retention by 8% ultimately● Generated new growth streams by creating tiered offerings via data-driven insights from the platform in collaboration with business and strategy teams thus bringing in incremental revenue of INR 3 Million● Gamified the platform using the Octalysis framework by introducing a calibrated skill development scale to measure achievements and thus driving the retention and engagement of the users
experience.description_html: ● Developed a personalized dashboard using the Fogg model, built a hypothesis from data trends, and validated it through user interviews; understanding their pain points and motivating them via prioritized prompts & a summary of their activities, thus boosting engagement by 26 percentage points● Applied the Hook model to increase new user activation by 23% by nudging them via curated journeys created by looking at historical data patterns of retention rates● Introduced a gamified league leaderboard system by making similar skilled users compete, ranking & promoting them to drive retention by 8% ultimately● Generated new growth streams by creating tiered offerings via data-driven insights from the platform in collaboration with business and strategy teams thus bringing in incremental revenue of INR 3 Million● Gamified the platform using the Octalysis framework by introducing a calibrated skill development scale to measure achievements and thus driving the retention and engagement of the users

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: ● Managing the scope of development by analyzing user journeys, defining & tracking KPIs using Mixpanel & SQL● Writing API workflows to interact with backend processes using the no-code tool Bubble & developingwireframes for better visualization in Figma
